 2020-09622020-11-27,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectNOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. - NGTL System Expansion Project
PrecisOrder extending the time limit for the Governor Council decision with respect to the NGTL System Expansion Project proposed by NOVA Gas Transmission Ltd. from December 3, 2020 to May 3, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
